directions.step:
Mix ingredients in the order given. Turn into a greased 11/2 qt. baking dish and set in a shallow pan of hot water. Bake in preheated 350Â° oven for about 1 hour, or until set. Serve hot or cold. Great with barbecued chicken or spare ribs or steak. MC formatting by bobbi744@sojourn.com
NOTES : Alexia Smith is a compulsive recipe collector. She even carries her favorite recipes with her when she travels. Recipe by: Celebrity Cookbook by Johna Blinn, '81
